chatGptLabel: translation topics based on site's readers
promptPrefix:
Your task is to check what the site is about and who are the readers. All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. The site is this:

[PROMPT]

Then, based on the readers of the site, suggest 3 topics related to translation or localization that are relevant to the readers. Article title ideas should include the keyword given. Provide complex title ideas please.
title: translation topics based on site's readers
